imagelib
Class ImageParsing

java.lang.Object
  imagelib.ImageParsing

public class ImageParsing
extends java.lang.Object

Class that contains image to data parsing functions such as hue histogram, value histogram
They are all static functions, therefore are passed in the Processing Applet, the image and required variables and return the result directly

Author:
Barkin Aygun

Method Detail

hist

public static double[] hist(processing.core.PApplet app,
                            processing.core.PImage img)
Returns the value histogram of a PImage as a double array

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
img - PImage to be converted
Returns:
an array of doubles that contains 256 bins

hist

public static double[] hist(processing.core.PApplet app,
                            int[] pixels)
Override for hist function using the int array of pixels instead of the image

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
pixels - Array of integers containing pixels of image
Returns:
an array of doubles that contains 256 bins

histBW

public static double[] histBW(processing.core.PApplet app,
                              processing.core.PImage img,
                              int bins)
Returns the histogram of the image after converting it to black and white with the specified number of bins

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
img - PImage to be converted
bins - Number of bins to have in the histogram
Returns:
an array of doubles that contains [bins] bins

histBW

public static double[] histBW(processing.core.PApplet app,
                              int[] pixels,
                              int bins)
Override for histBW function that uses the pixel array instead of PImage

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
pixels - Array of integers containing pixels of the image
bins - Number of bins to have in the histogram
Returns:
an array of doubles that contains [bins] bins

histColor

public static double[] histColor(processing.core.PApplet app,
                                 processing.core.PImage img,
                                 int bins,
                                 int COLOR)
Returns the color histogram of the image as a single array of doubles where it is bins * 3 length, if COLOR is specified to be anything, than it is only bins length for that color value

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
img - PImage to be converted
bins - Number of bins in the histogram
COLOR - RED/GREEN/BLUE/ALL depending on what user wants
Returns:
array of doubles containing the histogram

histColor

public static double[] histColor(processing.core.PApplet app,
                                 int[] pixels,
                                 int bins,
                                 int COLOR)
Override for histColor function using the pixel array of the image

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
pixels - Array of pixels of the image to be converted
bins - Number of bins in the histogram
COLOR - RED/GREEN/BLUE/ALL depending on what user wants
Returns:
array of doubles containing the histogram

histHue

public static double[] histHue(processing.core.PApplet app,
                               processing.core.PImage img,
                               int hueLim,
                               boolean showBlack)
Creates the hue histogram of the image with given number of bins and whether to include dark pixels or not

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
img - PImage to be converted
hueLim - Number of bins to have
showBlack - Set to true to include black pixels or not
Returns:
array of doubles as the hue histogram

histHue

public static double[] histHue(processing.core.PApplet app,
                               int[] pixels,
                               int hueLim,
                               boolean showBlack)
Creates the hue histogram of the image with given number of bins and whether to include dark pixels or not

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
pixels - Array of pixels of the image to be converted
hueLim - Number of bins to have
showBlack - Set to true to include black pixels or not
Returns:
array of doubles as the hue histogram

                               processing.core.PImage img)

Parameters:
app - Processing Applet calling the function
img - PImage to be converted
Returns:
array of doubles of the hue histogram
